typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Device as string,
		{ SerialNo} as string,
		{ Battery Level} as string,
		{ Measure Date Time} as string,
		{ Temperature} as string,
		{ Step} as string,
		{ Calorie} as string,
		{ Sleep State} as string,
		{ Sleep Hour} as string,
		{ Sleep Minute} as string,
		SubjectID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> active
source(output(
		Device as string,
		{ Measure Date Time} as string,
		{ Exist} as string,
		SubjectID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> exist
source(output(
		Device as string,
		{ SerialNo} as string,
		{ Battery Level} as string,
		{ Measure Date Time} as string,
		{ Systolic Pressure} as string,
		{ Diastolic Pressure} as string,
		{ Mean Arterial Pressure} as string,
		{ Pulse Rate} as string,
		{ Irregular Pulse Flag} as string,
		{ Pulse Rate Range Detection Flag} as string,
		SubjectID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sphy
active select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
exist select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
sphy select(mapColumn(
		{ Measure Date Time}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select1 sink(input(
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> timeInfo
Select2 sink(input(
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> timeInfo1
Select3 sink(input(
		{'SubjectID'} as string,
		{ 'Appetite Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Preference Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'Sleep Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{'Anxiety about health Questionnaire results'} as string,
		{ 'I can go up and down stairs without being transmitted to the railing or wall'} as string,
		{ 'I can walk for more than 15 minutes'} as string,
		{ 'I am actively going out'} as string,
		{ 'Do the cleaning and washing yourself'} as string,
		{ 'Shop for daily necessities yourself'} as string,
		{ 'No weight loss of more than 2-3 kg in the last 6 months'} as string,
		{ 'No weight gain of more than 2-3 kg in the last 2 months'} as string,
		{ 'Exercise function'} as string,
		{ 'Nutrition'} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> timeInfo2
